resources.string: Manage your financial income and \n expenses in one app. BukuCuan provides money management for with just several clicks !
1. Go to transaction page to make your first transaction
2. Press the add sign button at the right bottom corner in the menu
3. Add transaction details such as type, category, amount and note of the transaction
4. Save your transaction by pressing the save transaction button
5. After filling the transaction details, you can see that the transaction will immediately appear on the transaction menu
6. You can delete the transaction that you have made, by long pressing the transaction
7. If you want to update your transaction details, you can just click the transaction that you want to change
8. If you want to filter your transaction by a specific time, you can press one of the the filter button on the top
9. You can also filter transaction on a certain date by setting the start and end date using date filter button
10. Voila ! Now your transactions have been filtered based on the date that you\'ve set !
